Description:
NPE will pop up when set the table sharing result set from chart as none[00]

Step:
1. New a datasource and dataset.
2. New a chart and binding the dataset.
3. New a table and binding the result set from chart.
4. Open the table binding view and set the report item as none

Actual result:
Exception is pop up.
